title: Bizarre Love Triangle – The Distance Between us in this Triangle is a Convergent Zero - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   School Life   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple Personalities
author: Misaki Saginomiya   岬鷺宮
description:
Yano Shiki, a boy who only shows a facade.
Minase Akiha, a quiet and reserved transfer student.
Minase Haruka, the other side of Akiha.
This is their bizarre love story, one where the distance between them is limitless/zero.>
